# User Guide


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(sf, tmap, shiny, shinythemes, plotly, tidyverse, ggstatsplot, tools)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
wp_ngaTrim <- read_rds("data/geodata/wp_ngaTrim.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(wp_ngaTrim) +
  tm_fill("pct_functional",
          n = 5,
          style = "pretty",
          palette = "YlOrRd") +
  tm_borders(lwd = 0.1,  
             alpha = 1) +
  tm_view(set.zoom.limits = c(11, 14))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](user_guide_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
districts <- wp_ngaTrim %>%
  filter(shapeName %in% "Aba North")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
inputDistrict <-  wp_ngaTrim %>%
  filter(shapeName %in% c("Aba North", "Apa"))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(wp_ngaTrim) +
  tm_polygons() +
tm_shape(inputDistrict) +
  tm_fill("pct_functional",
          n = 5,
          style = "pretty",
          palette = "YlOrRd") +

             alpha = 1) +
  tm_view(set.zoom.limits = c(11, 14))
```
